mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cartno, pno, title, price, mno) values (seq_cart_cartno.nextval, #{pno}, #{title}, #{price}, #{mno})
mapper.select: select * from TBL_CART tc LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCTFILE tp on tc.PNO = tp.PNO
SELECT count(pno) FROM TBL_CART WHERE pno=#{pno} and mno=#{mno}
mapper.update: update tbl_cart set quantity=quantity + #{upno} where cartno=#{cartno}
update tbl_cart set quantity=quantity + #{downno} where cartno=#{cartno}
update tbl_cart set quantity=quantity + 1 where pno=#{pno}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_cart tc left join tbl_productfile tp on tc.pno = tp.pno where tc.mno = #{mno}
